attributes.action: gain funding to allow a TV Advertisement for the Air Training Corps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having seen the numbers drop in the Air Training Corps and other youth organisations, I think that we need to have funding for a TV Advert to gain members, by filming some of the things we do, and introducing them to a website where they can find their nearest squadron etc.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
